recent.headline: What ECB Stimulus Has Done
recent.description: In March 2015, the European Central Bank launched a quantitative-easing, or QE, program, its latest effort to combat ultralow eurozone inflation. Such bond-buying stimulus tends to weaken the currency, boost stocks and lower financing costs.

recent.headline: President Trump’s Speech: How the Topics Have Changed
recent.description: Immigration and national security dominated President Trump's address to Congress this year as last year, but elsewhere the focus has shifted. Taxes, a major topic last year, have given way to health care, criminal-justice reform and calls for bipartisanship.
